data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will persistently bring generally fine weather to Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to start affecting southern China gradually next Tuesday. Winds will strengthen over the region. It will become cold over the coast of Guangdong in the following couple of days. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will linger over the seas east of the Philippines in the next few days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260118","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 at first, up to force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine and dry.","forecastMaxtemp":{"value":23,"unit":"C"},"forecastMintemp":{"value":18,"unit":"C"},"forecastMaxrh":{"value":75,"unit":"percent"},"forecastMinrh":{"value":50,"unit":"percent"},"ForecastIcon":51,"PSR":"Low"},{"forecastDate":"20260119","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5.","forecastWeather":"Fine.
